caption: I admire this venue very much. It has a happy atmosphere. The cuisine is good. the service is effective and the waiters are trained. The pay is decent. truly recommend.
I love this restaurant a lot. there is a different mood. The cuisine is very tasty. the service is effective and the stuff is well trained. The price is decent. truly recommend.
Awesome! Lunch special is a great deal. Two selections of Thai foods for $10.95 plus a side (salad or soup). Wonderful service

I meet friends in this restaurant from time to time! This is my favorite restaurant to eat.  I visit this spot at least once a month. The food is just great, the workers are courteous and the payment is fair. I like eating in this place over a decent meal.
